reviewText: Shipped out quickly.  Great television series.  Love it!!

... and while these aren't complete, season sets, I'll take as many as being offered until complete sets are made available.  fans of this should cast their vote at tv shows on dvd's site.  I never tire of watching Trouble With Father.  An enjoyable 90 minutes or so in another, more innocent time.  During the golden age of the medium when television was actually worth watching.  I want more already! You won't find this on TV Land, so I strongly encourage other fans to purchase this DVD.
